pr_title: Fix Datastore broken test that requires an index

timeline.message: add required index in the test

timeline.bodyText: Can you put the index creating logic in a helper function and then put it in the @BeforeClass of the test? So that in the future if we have another test that needs an index it will be clear how to add it.
timeline.author: dzou

timeline.bodyText: I don't think you need the try/catch to print an extra message for the user; it would be just as clear to add a 1-liner comment that the test may fail if running for the first time since it takes time to create the index.
